channel.title: モノコセル
channel.description: Recent content on モノコセル

item.title: VulsRepo v0.3.0 now supports displaying EOL information and filtering reference information
item.description: The EOL information display added in Vuls v0.15.0 is now supported. You can now filter the reference information by tags and information source. The version numbering system has been changed. x.y.z x … Major changes y … Small changes z … Bug fixes Features #192 Added Errors and Warnings on pivot table. EOL information is included in warnings in the output of Vuls v0.15.0 and later. #188 Reference information can now be filtered by tags.

item.title: VulsRepo v0.2.8 now supports data output by Vuls v0.14.0 and later
item.description: VulsRepo online demo v.0.2.8 is here. v0.2.8 Features #186 Added display of NVD tag information (Vuls v0.14.0 or later required). #186 Added Reported Version on pivot table. Changes #186 Changed the style of the links. Fixes #186 Fixed an issue where Mitigation was not displayed in the output results of Vuls v0.14.0 or later. Docker image ishidaco/vulsrepo - Docker Hub docker pull ishidaco/vulsrepo docker pull ishidaco/vulsrepo:version-0.

item.title: VulsRepo v0.2.7 makes it easier to narrow down the data to be displayed
item.description: VulsRepo online demo v.0.2.7 is here. v0.2.7 Features #178 Added the ability to select data by specifying a date range and server (container). For example, to display a specific server (container) for the last month, you had to expand the date tree one by one and select the target server repeatedly for the number of days. With this improvement, it is now possible to do so by simply selecting Last Month and choosing the target server from the server list.

item.title: Added TSV download and pages for printing in VulsRepo v0.2.6
item.description: VulsRepo online demo v.0.2.6 is here. v0.2.6 Features #173 TSV Export renderer has been added and can now be downloaded as a TSV file. This will allow you to import and work with VulsRepo’s aggregate results in applications that support TSV files, such as Excel and LibreOffice Calc. #173 Printable pages can now be displayed in a separate window. This allows you to print just the tables and graphs on the printer or save them as PDF file (depending on your browser’s printing capabilities).

item.title: VulsRepo v0.2.5 supports Affected Processes and Trivy information
item.description: VulsRepo online demo v.0.2.5 is here. v0.2.5 Features #105 Affected Processes information is now viewable. #143 Trivy information is now viewable. Added Path and Title on pivot table and references on detail panel. #151 You can now choose to show or hide CveCcontents. #151 Changed to sort the CVSS Detail according to priority. #144 Changed CVSS Vector chart to distinguish between CVSS v3.

item.title: VulsRepo v0.2.4 supports RedHatAPI information
item.description: VulsRepo online demo v.0.2.4 is here. v0.2.4 Features #121 RedHatAPI information is now viewable. #70 Mitigation information is now viewable. #101 Pivot table settings can now be shared by URL. #113 ConfidenceScore has been added to the pivot table. Changes #111 Changed evaluation values for CVSSv3 (*) and CVSS (*) to affect CVSS chart drawing. #110 Change CVSSv3 (*) and CVSS (*) metrics sort order by decending value.

item.title: VulsRepo v0.2.3 supports Metasploit and more information display
item.description: VulsRepo online demo v.0.2.3 is here. v0.2.3 #72 USCERT is now shown in the CERT of the pivot table. #76 Show [WARN] if there is a warning on a scan. #73 Add Repository. #74 Add FixedIn and FixState. (Vuls v.0.9.2 or later required) #69 Add Metasploit Modules view to the details panel. (Vuls v.0.11.0 or later required) #81 Add USCERT Alert and JPCERT Alert indications to the details panel.

item.title: VulsRepo supports Debian Security Tracker
item.description: VulsRepo online demo is here. Now, VulsRepo supports Debian Security Tracker! You can see a sample of the following vulnerability scan results. Amazon Linux 2 Ubuntu 18.04 Raspbian 9.13 Raspberry Pi OS 10 Alpine Linux on Docker container See also https://github.com/ishiDACo/vulsrepo/releases/tag/v0.2.2

item.title: VulsRepo online demo
item.description: VulsRepo online demo is here. See also https://github.com/ishiDACo/vulsrepo
